column4: you need to enable normal upgrades: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QuantalQuetzal/TechnicalOverview/Beta1#Upgrading_from_Ubuntu_12.04_LTS (really more of a #ubuntu+1 issue though)
just to check can I safely do the upgrade from an SSH console? or do I need to boot into a recovery console? not sure if it updates ssh server during the upgrade might break something
you can upgrade over ssh, it usually isn't an issue
thx for the url I got the release-upgrades fixed.. here go nothing :)
